data.sentence: The word أَوْ comes from the root ا و and is associated with the meanings: or

data.meanings: to profit, do good, be useful, beneficial.
data.sentence: The word يَنْفَعُونَكُمْ comes from the root ن ف ع and is associated with the meanings: to profit, do good, be useful, beneficial.

data.meanings: to harm/hurt/injure/afflict, make inconvenient, annoy, evil adversity, famine, vicissitude of time, disease/death, loss/tribulation/hardship, to compel, drive forcibly, driven by necessity.
data.sentence: The word يَضُرُّونَ comes from the root ض ر ر and is associated with the meanings: to harm/hurt/injure/afflict, make inconvenient, annoy, evil adversity, famine, vicissitude of time, disease/death, loss/tribulation/hardship, to compel, drive forcibly, driven by necessity.
